title: Check Out "The Larkin" @ 50 Jones

posting_body: ['BRAND NEW APARTMENTS NOW LEASING-SCHEDULE YOUR VIRTUAL TOUR TODAY', 'Imagine coming home to a secluded oasis, in the heart of San Francisco’s thriving mid-market neighborhood.', 'At 50 Jones, studio, 1- and 2-bedroom apartments come complete with tasteful finishes and thoughtful conveniences.', 'The exclusive outdoor community space provides a welcoming respite from your busy day, while the central location connects you to innovative employers and emerging bars and restaurants.', 'It all meets at Jones + Market.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 111', 'OR Text', '111',
